org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainersample

Class AbstractBeanTupleApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.Application
      • org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainersample.AbstractBeanTupleApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vaadin.terminal.Terminal.ErrorListener, com.vaadin.terminal.URIHandler, com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeanTupleCustomFilteringApplication, BeanTupleSimpleFilteringApplication

    public abstract class AbstractBeanTupleApplication
extends com.vaadin.Application
implements com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener
    Shared core for applications demonstrating the BeanTupleContainer features. (LazyQueryContainer extended to work with JPA 2.0 Tuple queries, in such a way that it remains possible to edit the entities shown on each line).
    Author:
    Tommi S.E. Laukkanen, Modified by Jean-Fran√ßois Lamy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
